data.description:
# Traffic Lights Series - Part 2

In this series we are going to model traffic lights. In part 1 we just modelled the interface and the logic encapsualted within the traffic light itself. In this part, _part 2_, we will build upon the code written for part 1 and look at starting to model the controller to control two traffic lights.

## The Interface
The `ITrafficLightController` interface will have three methods.
- `AddTrafficLight` will allow a traffic light to be added to the system
- `Start` will start the system running the light sequence.
- `Stop` will stop the system running the light sequence.

## When should the lights be lit?
The lights should be lit as follows:

- After adding _any_ traffic light to the system it should immediately be set to `Standby` and hence show a `Red` light only.
- After adding two lights and starting the system (but not calling stop) the first light should change to `Red` and `Amber`. The second light should show `Red` only. 
- After adding two lights and starting the system and then stopping the system imediately both lights should immediately be set to `Standby` and hence show a `Red` light only.

## The Tests
Make the following tests pass...
- GivenTrafficLightController_WhenOneLightIsAdded_ThenTheLightShouldShowRedLightOnly
- GivenTrafficLightController_WhenANullLightIsAdded_ThenAnArgumentNullExceptionIsThrown
- GivenTrafficLightController_WhenTwoLightsAreAdded_ThenBothLightsShouldShowRedLightOnly
- GivenTrafficLightControllerWithTwoLightsAreAdded_WhenStarted_ThenFirstShouldShowRedAndAmber
- GivenTrafficLightControllerWithTwoLightsAreAdded_WhenStarted_ThenSecondShouldShowRedOnly
- GivenTrafficLightControllerWithTwoLightsAreAdded_WhenStartedAndThenStopped_BothShouldShowRedOnly
 
and pass the tests from part 1...

- GivenTrafficLight_ThenInterfaceIsImplemented
- GivenTrafficLight_WhenInstatiated_ThenRedLightIsOn_AndOthersAreOff
- GivenInstatiatedTrafficLight_WhenSetToAmberState_ThenAmberLightIsOn_AndOtherLightsAreOff
- GivenInstatiatedTrafficLight_WhenSetToGreenState_ThenGreenLightIsOn_AndGreenIsOff
- GivenInstatiatedTrafficLight_WhenSetToRedAmberState_ThenRedLightAndAmberLightIsOn_AndGreenIsOff
- GivenInstatiatedTrafficLight_WhenSetToRedState_ThenRedLightLightIsOn_AndOthersAreOff

## What's next?
In part 3 we will look at adding a further behaviour to the Traffic Light Controller.
